title: New: Priest – The Game
body:
X Priest X now known simply as **Priest**, released one of my favourite EPs of 2014, yet were rather quiet for the majority of the year.

Now with an album confirmed through Swedish label Emotion for the beginning of May, the duo (Madeline Priest and David Kayzk) are streaming the first single, the dreamy _The Game_. Like a more shoegaze inspired CHVRCHES, it could easily have slotted into Radio 1’s remake of the Drive soundtrack. Check it out below.
